title: Side Effects of the 2021 Oscars (with Desmond Thorne)
description:
This week we prove that there were enough movies for the Oscars to happen this year, and we get the picks and nix from our resident cinephile Desmond Thorne, host of film podcast Adventures In Black Cinema.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
